tool_description: Calculates various valuation multiples (EV/Revenue, EV/EBITDA, P/E, P/B, etc.) from financial and market data for comparable company and transaction analysis.

company_financials.description: Financial metrics for companies or transactions

calculation_basis.description: Basis for calculations - LTM, NTM, or forward

error_messages: Data length mismatch: Company financials and market values arrays must have the same length.
Invalid multiple types: Use supported multiples like 'EV/Revenue', 'EV/EBITDA', 'P/E', 'P/B', 'EV/EBIT'.
Missing financial data: Required financial metrics are missing for multiple calculations.
Invalid calculation basis: Use 'LTM' (Last Twelve Months), 'NTM' (Next Twelve Months), or 'forward'.
usage: Provide company_financials and market_values arrays, specify multiple_types to calculate, and optionally set calculation_basis. Returns calculated valuation multiples.

multiple_statistics.description: Statistical summary for each multiple type (mean, median, quartiles)
